name: Pestilence Swarm
description: The Pestilence Swarm is composed of numerous small insects, appearing lifeless in darkness until light prompts its attack; it thrives in subtlety and hits with diseased bites.
memorable: Inflicts the sewer plague, causing lasting exhaustion and debilitating effects over time.
goals: Incapacitate foes through ambush and spread infection.
relations: Often found in filth-ridden areas or near other pestilent creatures.
environment: Dark and unsanitary locations, typically where ambushes can be executed.
strengths: Stealthy and agile, with damage resistances and immunities to many control effects.
weaknesses: Low hit points and vulnerable when exposed to light.
attacks: Diseased Bites that deal significant piercing damage and have a chance to inflict sewer plague.
most_powerful_ability: Dormant in Darkness allows it to remain hidden until light triggers its attack.
senses: Has a passive perception of 11 which reflects basic awareness but is not exceptionally keen.
additional_information: Can occupy the same space as other creatures.
Can move through small openings due to its swarm nature.
Reverts to a dormant state after one minute in the dark unless damaged.
test_queries: insects that become active in light
swarm that attacks with diseased bites
